Package ohos.agp.components

Interface Picker.ElementFormatter

  • Enclosing class:
    Picker

    public static interface Picker.ElementFormatter
    Formats the left and right compound element objects for every item of Picker.

    The leftElement(int) interface needs to be implemented to display a element object on the left of every item.

    The rightElement(int) interface needs to be implemented to display a element object on the right of every item.

    null is returned if no element object is required on either side of the item.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Element leftElement​(int value)
      Formats the element object displayed on the left of every item of Picker.
      Element rightElement​(int value)
      Formats the element object displayed on the right of every item of Picker.

    • Method Detail

      • leftElement

        Element leftElement​(int value)
        Formats the element object displayed on the left of every item of Picker.
        Parameters:
        value - Indicates the current item.
        Returns:
        Returns the formatted Element object displayed on the left of the item; returns null if no element object is required.

      • rightElement

        Element rightElement​(int value)
        Formats the element object displayed on the right of every item of Picker.
        Parameters:
        value - Indicates the current item.
        Returns:
        Returns the formatted Element object displayed on the right of the item; returns null if no element object is required.
